card-no-eligible: Unfortunately your card is no longer eligible for this benefit.
card-no-length: Please enter all 16 digits of your Mastercard card number.
card-not-eligible: Card not recognized. Please check that your card details are entered correctly. Otherwise please use another Mastercard card.
card-invalid: This card number is invalid. Please try again.
card-is-reg: This card is already registered. Please Login or try again with a different Mastercard.
card-not-mastercard: Please enter a valid Mastercard card number.
pwd-not-match: Passwords do not match. Please try again.
pwd-invalid: Your password must contain only Latin characters.
email-invalid: Please enter a valid email address.
login-info-err: Your email address or password is incorrect. Please try again.
phone-invalid: Please fill in the correct format.
name-invalid: Your name has to be written in Latin letters, as shown on your passport.
email-is-reg: Email address already exists. Either log in Now or use another email address.
update-card-is-reg: This card is already registered and in use. Please try again with a different Mastercard or switch memberships.
reset-pwd-account-lock-desc: The code has been entered incorrectly 5 times. Your account will be locked for 5 minutes. Please try again later.
